p: In addition to the high prevalence, the co-circulation of DENV serotypes 1, 2 and 4 detected in this study highlights the endemicity of the disease in the region and the need for a molecular diagnosis to characterize the serotypes, since this factor is of concern. Secondary infections by serotypes other than the primary infection may trigger more severe clinical conditions, due to the potentiation of the infection by the action of pre-existing non-neutralizing heterologous antibodies in the patientsâ€™ serum [ 25].
